(4) Digital Transformation Success

Source: Patrick Forth, Tom Reichert, Romain de Laubier, and Saibal Chakraborty, "Flipping the Odds of Digital Transformation Success", Boston Consulting Group, October 2020



Mind the Gap Erik Wilde (@dret): API Program Management: Getting Your APIs to Work

(5) Digital Transformation Success Factors

  1. An Integrated Strategy with Clear Transformation Goals
  2. Leadership Commitment from CEO Through Middle Management
  3. Deploying High-Caliber Talent
  4. An Agile Governance Mindset That Drives Broader Adoption
  5. Effective Monitoring of Progress Toward Defined Outcomes
  6. Business-Led Modular Technology and Data Platform


Mind the Gap Erik Wilde (@dret): API Program Management: Getting Your APIs to Work

(6) Integrated Technology Model Teams

Source: Ross Frazier, Naufal Khan, Gautam Lunawat, and Amit Rahul, "Products and platforms: Is your technology operating model ready?", McKinsey Digital, February 2020

API Program Health Checks

Outline (API Program Health Checks)

  1. Mind the Gap [4]
  2. Getting Digital to Work [4]
  3. API Program Health Checks [4]
  4. Conclusions [1]
API Program Health Checks Erik Wilde (@dret): API Program Management: Getting Your APIs to Work

(14) Strategy Health Checks

  • API Strategy: Bridging business strategy and API platforms
    • Is there a coherent story for API vision/strategy/program/products/platform?
    • Is there a business capability map that's connected to API products?
    • Is there marketing for APIs both externally and internally?
  • API Monetization: How are APIs creating value?
    • What consideration is given to direct and indirect monetization models?
    • Are API designers and developers considering an API's value proposition?
    • Are there metrics in place to better understand how APIs create value?


API Program Health Checks Erik Wilde (@dret): API Program Management: Getting Your APIs to Work

(15) Technology Health Checks

  • API Design: Treating APIs as first-class citizens
    • Do you (try to) use an API first approach?
    • Are you using/exploring multiple API styles?
    • How collaborative is the API design process?
  • API Platform: Helping teams to deliver value quickly and continuously
    • Is the platform team using applying a product mindset to the platform?
    • Is the platform supporting multiple implementation technologies?
    • Does the platform encourage contributions to the platform?


API Program Health Checks Erik Wilde (@dret): API Program Management: Getting Your APIs to Work

(16) Change Health Checks

  • API Governance: Creating a coherent API landscape
    • Do you have guidelines and what's the scope of the guidelines?
    • How do you manage guidelines and do you manage them in a collaborative way?
    • How much of governance and guidelines is automated and shifted left?
  • API Training, Education, and Community: Building and sustaining capability
    • Does your API education and training cover technical and non-technical roles?
    • Do you invest in staying up-to-date with technologies and tools?
    • Do you have developer relations for external and/or internal APIs?


API Program Health Checks Erik Wilde (@dret): API Program Management: Getting Your APIs to Work

(17) API Program Health Check Summary

  1. API Strategy: Bridging business strategy and API platforms
  2. API Monetization: How are APIs creating value?
  3. API Design: Treating APIs as first-class citizens
  4. API Platform: Helping teams to deliver value quickly and continuously
  5. API Governance: Creating a coherent API landscape
  6. API Education: A common mindset and language for everybody
